channel.title: NetNewsWire Betas
channel.description: Most recent NetNewsWire changes with links to updates.

item.title: NetNewsWire 6.2b4
item.description:
Changes since 6.2b3:

  • Changed Markdown behavior â€” it now prefers source:markdown, when present, over description and content:encoded, and renders the Markdown as HTML and uses it as the article body
  • Added a dotted underline to links in the Sepia theme, to make links more visible

item.title: NetNewsWire 6.2b3
item.description:
Changes since 6.2b2:

  • Added support for source:markdown to the RSS parser
